In sq. miles this much burned by wildfire in 2021 in these countries alone (not incl. many fires in Brazil, Africa, elsewhere)

Russia - 70,000
US - 9,000 
Canada - 13,000
Turkey - 681
Greece - 424
Italy - 403
(total 93,508)

The UK is 93,628 sq. miles.
